view.interfaces

Interface IExhibitView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExhibitView

    public interface IExhibitView
    Interface for the list of exhibit of the art gallery.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • attachController

        void attachController(IControllerExhibit ctrl)
        Attaches the controller to the ExhibitView.
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller.

      • addData

        void addData(java.lang.Long code,
             java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String curator,
             java.util.Calendar dateB,
             java.util.Calendar dateE,
             int nPieces,
             double costEx,
             double costTicket)
        Adds a new exhibit to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        code - the exhibit's code.
        title - the exhibit's title.
        curator - the exhibit's curator.
        dateB - the commencement date of the exhibit.
        dateE - the end date of the exhibit.
        nPieces - the number of pieces of the artworks.
        costEx - the exhibit's cost.
        costTicket - the ticket's cost of the exhibit.

      • editData

        void editData(int row,
              java.lang.Long code,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String curator,
              java.util.Calendar dateB,
              java.util.Calendar dateE,
              int nPieces,
              double costEx,
              double costTicket)
        Changes the selected exhibit.
        Parameters:
        row - the selected table's row.
        code - the exhibit's code.
        title - the exhibit's title.
        curator - the exhibit's curator.
        dateB - the commencement date of the exhibit.
        dateE - the end date of the exhibit.
        nPieces - the number of pieces of the artworks.
        costEx - the exhibit's cost.
        costTicket - the ticket's cost of the exhibit.

      • editNPiecesCell

        void editNPiecesCell(int nPieces,
                     int row)
        Changes the cell "Num. pezzi" of the specific selected exhibit.
        Parameters:
        nPieces - the new value of the number of pieces of the artworks.
        row - the selected table's row.

      • clearData

        void clearData(int row)
        Deletes the selected exhibit.
        Parameters:
        row - the selected table's row.
